error_request_message: §cYou've already sent this player a request!
request_you_teleport_chat_message: §7§o%s requested you to teleport to them
cooldown_error_message: §cYou must wait %s second%s before you can teleport
destination_message: §3%s will be teleported to you in %s second%s
config_delay_message: §7The amount of time, in seconds, the player must wait before being teleported to another player.
config_cooldown_message: §7The amount of time, in seconds, the player must wait after teleporting to another player before they can teleport again.
config_delay_error_message: §cTeleport delay values must be whole numbers!
config_cooldown_error_message: §cTeleport cooldown values must be whole numbers!
